column2: No common name, an ambrosia beetle

column38: Information is unclear. CABI lists many "main hosts" (including Prunus spp.) with no reference. The NPRG report lists many hosts but only Poplar and Willow as "primary hosts."  I am only listing poplar and willow as a primary host.
This beetle also can live in many dead wood hosts. Only known major living hosts are included here.

column1: ▲ = Primary host (economic damage has been reported in the scientific literature)
* = Included as a commodity and a tree/shrub
